dt: {bc}forbidding or restricting closed meetings of legislative or executive bodies and sometimes providing for public access to records

dt: {bc}a hybrid striped bass that is a cross between a female {d_link|white bass|white bass} ({it}Morone chrysops{/it}) and a male {d_link|striped bass|striped bass} ({it}Morone saxatilis{/it}) and is silvery-white with dark usually discontinuous or irregular horizontal stripes along the sides
Like the {d_link|wiper|wiper:2}, the sunshine bass has an aggressive nature and is bred chiefly as a sport fish for stocking lakes, streams, and reservoirs.

dt.t: The {wi}sunshine bass{/wi} tends to stay in deeper water like its parent fish, but is an aggressive striker on live bait when it is feeding near the surface or in shallower water.
The company, located in Keo, Arkansas, sells fingerlings to U.S. and international growers, who raise {wi}sunshine bass{/wi} for restaurants and grocery outlets.

shortdef: a hybrid striped bass that is a cross between a female white bass (Morone chrysops) and a male striped bass (Morone saxatilis) and is silvery-white with dark usually discontinuous or irregular horizontal stripes along the sides —called also sunshine

dt: urban center north of Brisbane in easternmost Queensland, Australia {it}population{/it} 209,263

dt: {bc}someone or something that makes a person happier or a place more cheerful

dt.t: Their baby girl was their own little {it}ray of sunshine{/it}.

shortdef: someone or something that makes a person happier or a place more cheerful
